desc: Added return types to `Auth` methods
Added `signOut()` method, to allow apps to request the user to sign out
Added optional parameter `{ force: boolean }` to `signIn` method on `Auth`. If `force` is `true`, then the login popup will show to the user even if the user is already logged in.
Increased z-index of auth popup modal to max value (2147483647) to ensure it is always visible when open
Made internal `Auth` methods private
Fixed bug that caused the error handler function `.onSnapshot(successHandlerFn, errorHandlerFn)` to be called on snapshots when a request is cancelled (i.e. when all subscribers are removed).
Added `ethPersonalSignRecoverPublicKey(sig, msg)` to easily get a public key from a signed message.
Allow `origin` configuration property to be passed into `Auth`, this is require if `window.location.origin` is not available.
Added a new `bytes` type
@read and @call directives on collections that allow anyone to read or call a function in a collection
Array can be of Collection type
Array of Collection type can be used with read/call/delegate directives
Record#get, Collection#get, Query#get now signs requests on private collections
Fixed "Failed to fetch metadata" in the explorer
The polybase-ts client libraries are now natively web-compatible
Fixed invalid dependencies in CDN bundles
Authorization rules using `@public`, `@read`, `@call` and `@delegate`
New collection interface AST that is now stored in the database. Clients do not need to parse collection code anymore
Authentication library `@polybase/auth`
Export types from @polybase/util
Replaced lodash dependency with `Object.assign`
Fixed @polybase/client's `applySchema` not working with custom `defaultNamespace`
@polybase/client `collecton.onSnapshot(dataFn, errFn)` now supports being passed `errFn` handler as an optional second parameter
Added `lastRecordUpdated` and `publicKey` to `CollectionMeta` type
Nested fields are now indexable, you can now filter and sort by them.
@polybase/client's applySchema now re-throws errors
New function `Record#sign()` which signs a record using an account's private key
New function `Record#verify()` which verifies a signed record using an account's public key
New `File` record type, allowing you to store and reference files in your collections
Fixed an issue where user accounts could not be deleted
Improved error handling for query failures
Fixed a bug where `Record#get()` could not handle missing records
Added support for the `after` and `before` parameters in pagination
Fixed an issue where the `limit` parameter was not being respected in queries
Fixed a bug causing duplicate record creation when using the `create` method
Fixed an issue where query results were not being sorted correctly
Fixed a bug causing incorrect query results when using `contains` and `containsAny`
Added support for the `distinct` parameter in queries
Fixed a bug causing incorrect query results when using `notContains` and `notContainsAny`
Fixed a bug causing query timeouts when using `sortBy`
Added support for the `count` parameter in queries
Fixed a bug causing the `delete` method to fail
Fixed a bug causing the `limit` parameter to be ignored in certain cases
Fixed a bug causing the `delete` method to fail when an index was used
Fixed a bug causing the `limit` parameter to be ignored when an index was used
Fixed a bug causing the `update` method to fail when an index was used
Fixed a bug causing the `get` method to fail when an index was used
Fixed a bug causing the `create` method to fail when an index was used
